column1: # Legacy manifest; keep in sync with e2e-tests.json5.

column4: Builds and runs thin packager (core flow, runtime + integrity).
column6: Check toolchain (cc/pkg-config/libzstd) and thin build logs.

column4: Validates anti-debug and hardening probes around thin runtime.
column6: Check ptrace/perf/bpf tooling and strict env flags.

column4: Validates real runtime dump behavior (gcore/external dumps).
column6: Check gcore/gdb or SEAL_E2E_DUMP_CMD and SEAL_E2E_REAL_DUMP.

column4: Covers legacy packagers (bundle/SEA) compatibility and runtime.
column6: Check postject/SEA tooling and packager availability.

column4: Checks packager compatibility (sentinel/strip/elfPacker) via config explain.
column6: Verify config explain output and packager gating.

column4: Checks CLI bash completion output and target discovery.
column6: Check bash availability and completion script output.
Check SSH/systemd readiness and example workspace.

column4: Verifies sentinel install/verify paths and hardware IDs.
column6: Check root access, /etc/machine-id, and host device IDs.
Check kernel/ptrace settings and protection config.

column4: Tests JS/C obfuscation pipeline and runtime behavior.
column6: Check obfuscator tools and build logs.

column4: Verifies strip/ELF cleanup rules and runtime smoke.
column6: Check strip tool and ELF expectations.

column4: Tests C obfuscator variants and runtime checks.
column6: Check C++ toolchain and obfuscator binaries.

column4: Ensures postject/SEA injection workflow is functional.
column6: Check postject availability and SEA metadata.
Check Playwright browsers and port availability.

column4: Validates decoy file installation and collision handling.
column6: Check decoy config and output integrity.
Check SSH, sudo, and target config.
